PALTON MORGANDeveloping Strategic Value Propositions in Real Estate across Africa

Palton Morgan s is a real estate development brand, focused on advancing lives. We create contemporary structures, aspirational lifestyle and thriving communities.

Palton Morgan is arguable, the most successful real estate development and investment brand led by Nigerians and international teams who delivered the most iconic projects in different parts of the world. The company’s drive for success has apparently led to an unswerving knack for detail and an uncompromising desire for customer care and satisfaction, in addition to the adoption of cutting-edge technology.

Palton Morgan is constantly scaling up its operations by acquiring the required resources and capabilities along the way. To achieve this, it remains focused on its primary lines of business in the acquisition, sales, construction and marketing of prime residential properties and superior client advisory services.

OUR MISSIONA team of professionals committed to advancing lives through design, lifestyle and thriving communities.

OUR MISSIONA team of professionals committed to advancing lives through design, lifestyle and thriving communities.

MEMBER COMPANIESPalton Morgan Holds Majority Shares In All Its Member Companies

GRENADINES HOMES
Is a property development company dedicated to reinventing the concept of luxury living in Nigeria and beyond. Founded on the precept of integrity and uncompromising focus on quality over volume
VIEW MORE

OCEANNA DEVELOPMENT

Is a revolution that Nigeria wants, it is dedicated to developing luxury lifestyles by leveraging innovation, technology and design in providing the highest level of comfort, encouraging business synergy and convivial community.
VIEW MORE

PROPERTYMART

Offers the most valuable and well-planned estate in Nigeria, having delivered major housing projects over the years. The company's successes is built on it's drive to continue delivering the highest quality homes and the most valuable price.
VIEW MORE

Our Commitment

“As we power through an era when global investors and business leaders look to Africa as the next region of transformative economic growth with an increasing attention to our great nation; hope and aspiration are ever more on the rise. A future where Nigeria is a leading nation in the global arena is quickly becoming a reality and we will play our part revolutionizing Nigerian Real Estate.”

Adeyinka Adesope

Group Managing Director
